page.title: 10SERVICES WOODSPRING VILLAGES
page.content: Wick St. Lawrence has no village shop, Post Office or public house but there is a public telephone kiosk. Kingston Seymour has a general store with a sub-post office but no public house. Milk and coal are delivered to both villages. It is necessary to go to Clevedon,Yatton,Worle or Weston Super Mare for doctors,dentists,lawyers and medical prescriptions. Doctors do make house calls when necessary.Neither village has a policeman. There are police, fire and ambulance stations in Weston,Clevedon and Nailsea. Of the public utilaties electricity, water and main drainage are available in both villages.There is no gas supply or street lighting to either village.The apparent lack of services does not seem to be a deprivation as all emergencies are answered just as quickly as in the towns.
